AVSEC ORDER 04 / 2001 
 
SUB : 
CARGO SECURITY 
 
 
 
In exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of the Aircraft Act,. 1934 
(XXII of 1934), the Commissioner of Security Civil Aviation, for the purpose of 
securing the safety of aircraft operations which inter-alias includes the security of 
airports, ATCA, navigational facilities, vital installations, passengers and 
employee etc., directs that: - 
 
1) 
In order to enforce security controls to the cargo consignments the 
security declaration prescribed as per annexure `A’ shall be signed 
by the authorized cargo agents. 
 
2) 
The Airlines operators shall ensure to take the prescribed priority 
declaration from the cargo agents others while accepting the cargo 
consignment for transportation by air. 
 (VEERANNA AIVALLI) 
COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CIVIL AVIATION) 
 
(REF:NO.CAS-8(4B)/2001/Div-I    Dated 31.05.2001)
